11.1.18  9:39 am   All the communities I used to be part of now seem to be openly admitting that they have no idea what they're doing. I -feel- like I've got an idea as to what I'm doing? But I'm not able to articulate it. I feel like I'm improved, but I can't word how.Is this a positive, or am I just very quickly going nowhere?
